mapper.sql: id, title, file_name AS fileName, create_time AS createTime, modify_time AS modifyTime,infomation,click_count AS clickCount
mapper.select:
SELECT t.id, t.title AS title,t.file_name AS fileName,t.create_time AS createTime,t.modify_time AS modifyTime,infomation FROM industry t where true
and t.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
